item.title: [CSS] Make hamburger menu with only css
item.description:
Introduction Without using JavaScript, CSS alone made a simple hamburger menu. Also, narrowing the screen of this website will display this hamburger menu.
html <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <style type="text/css"> .hamburger-menu #hamburger-handler { display: none; } .hamburger-menu .content { display: none; } .hamburger-menu .cross { display: none; left: 0px; top: 0px; } .hamburger-menu #hamburger-handler:checked ~ .content { display: list-item; } .hamburger-menu #hamburger-handler:checked ~ .cross { display: block; } .
